msbt.message: You did it!II can't believe it! You got everything right!Color? Check. Shine? Check. Size? CHECK. You made everything about me perfect!We have a word for people like you in the snow world—amazing. Did you get that? UhmayZING!! Bud. I'm so happy right now. I know it's dangerous for snowfolks to cry, but I don't think I can help myself.

You're looking at pure snowfolk perfection right here. But you know that. You made me!I'm the real deal, thanks to you, bud. I'm perfect in every way that involves rounded snow. YOUknow how to build a snowperson.

Your perfect Snowboy is here!It's not braggy if it's true. And it's only true because of you!Just point me in the direction of the nearest snow museum, and I'll be on my way, 'cause that's where I belong. Or I can stick around here and show the locals what a flawless snow creation looks like.

Ohhhhh! So close!My head should be a little better matched to my body.But I shouldn't be so picky I mean, you did bring me to life.That was super cool of you! I'll just, uh, work on polishing up my looks whenever I get a chance.

Ohhhhh! So close! I was almost a perfect snowperson.It's the little details that matterYou know, like making my head the right size for my body. But who am I to complain? You did bring me to life, right? That was a pretty cool thing to do.

Almost! So, so close.Giving 90 percent to a project is one way to go, sure. But that extra effort takes you to the pro snow circuit. And I really want to see you on the pro snow circuit.Oh Sorry. I should be thanking you for making me! Sothank you for making me!

Um We, uh, didn't quite get me right. And by "we" I mean "you."I bet you were just going for "good enough." But is "good enough" really good enough for a snowperson? No! You have to put your whole heart into it! Every flake matters! 'Cause I'm feelin' kinda so-so right now.
Huh You went with this size head Interesting choice. Verrry interesting.No. It's good. Really. Everything's fine JustfineGaaaaah! But I could have been so much cooler with just a little more effort!

Yo, y'all! It's suh-suh-Snowboy time!Cool slogan, right? I'm sure everyone will be saying that pretty soon here.Youdon't seem convinced.Well maybe I'd have a better slogan if you'd put a little more work into making me cool! This is on YOU!

Wonderful!Just. Wonderful.That's some snowy sarcasm, or "snowcasm," in case you were wondering. You know, as my head ball was rolling end-over-end, I had a feeling I was going to end up like this. I would have said something, but I didn't have a mouth yet. And now Now I just feel unnnncool.

What. Is. Going. On.Bud.Crafting the perfect snowperson isn't a skill that comes easily. I get it.But this is ridiculous!Were you not wearing gloves? Did you sneeze while putting me together? COME ON!
I was really hoping to go into snow modeling or snow acting.But I guess I could be a prop in a holiday scene, even if I do look a little off.Excuse me The snow around my eyes is melting
I can't praise you enough for your top-notch snow-sculpting skills. Whoa. That's kind of hard to say.
Even I can't play it cool here. I'm practically melting with appreciation for you and your snow skills.
I think it's only appropriate that I share a DIY recipe with such a gifted snow crafter. Let's see I know! I'll show you how to make !Check out your NookPhone!
It's a DIY recipe for ! Check your phone later!
And take a large snowflake too. It's required to craft the item.
Ornot. You're holding too many things. Why don't you sort that out and then find your way back to me?
I've placed it with your belongings. Use it to make a special item of mine.
I'll give you a special item as a rewardI'll pop it in the mail for you, so keep an eye out for it!
As a thank-you, I'll give you this awesome large snowflake!
I mean I really did want to reward you. But you're holding too much stuff, bud. Get yourself situated, come back, and I'll give you something good.
I put your thank-you gift among your belongings. Now go on and craft an item that'll remind you of me!
Bud. I am so excited at how coooool you made me.
Wow I could be a snow model. And YOUYou've got the makings of a pro snow sculptor.
I was built cool, and it's all because of you, bud. Thank you so much.
Oh, hey! I'll give you this now, 'cause I couldn't before.
This special item is all yours!
Please, take it! It's an awesome large snowflake!
I was built today, so I guess that makes today my birthday! I'm soooo glad I was born soooo cool. I'm in a giving mood, so I'm going to share a way to make a special item.
I was built today, so I guess that makes today my birthday! I'm soooo glad I was born soooo cool. I'm feeling generous for my birthday, so here's a little present for YOU!
Bud. I got a large snowflake, and I want you to have it.Put it to good use!
Here's a large snowflake for an expert snow sculptor.You might think every snowperson has a huge collection of these, but they're actually hard to come by!
I'm so embarrassed. Turns out I had this large snowflake stuck to me.Please take it away from me. It's caused me too much grief, and I'm sure you'll find a use for it.
Oh, hey! Take this large snowflake.It's the least I can do to thank you for making me...me.
You know what you need? You need a large snowflake!It's my dramatic parting gift to you, handed over as I melt into oblivion...Which is actually way more fun than it sounds!
Take this before I melt away, bud. It's a large snowflake.Keep it close, and remember me fondly when you use it.Too much? Yeah, just craft something cool with it.
Snow ruled the land not so long ago. I'm talking about yesterday...
Spring is so colorful. It really makes me stand out!
It's hot, butI've heard summer is even hotter.I don't wanna think about it.
I'm getting rarer by the minute. Pretty soon, I might be the only snow around. Cool, huh?
I won't be around forever, you know. Pretty soon, I'll have to melt on down the road.I don't mean to sound so cold. I will miss you. It's just that I have ice water running through my veins.
Well, I hope to see you next winter, but I guess that depends on whether or not you build me again!
It's my birthday today! Cake sounds yummy, butno candles, please.
This seems like a very nice island. It'll be fun hanging out here!
I know I was just born today, but for some reason I just don't feel like a kid. I'm an old soul, I guess.
Hey! You wanna play rock-paper- scissors? Ready? Here we goUm Sorry I just wanted to try.
Would you believe me if I told you I was an alien? I mean, I did fall from the sky, you know. Actually, I fell in a million pieces. I'm like an entire alien civilization!
Even snowfolks get cold sometimes. I bet you didn't know that.
This island is a good home, but I wouldn't mind traveling a bit.You knowmeet some snowfolk from all over the world, compare snow stories, try some new snow foods.
Snowpeeps have it easy when it comes to working out.One good freeze, and we've got muscles like sculpted steel.
I've lost a little weight lately, but it's mostly water weight
I've heard all about summer, but I'd really like to experience it first-hand.I know! Be careful what you wish for, right? It's just that I'm kind of a daredevil, and I really want to try it.
It's funny to think that everything about me fell from the skyeven my voice!
You know what would be a good home for me? A walk-in freezer would be a good home for me.
I am really impressed with the way you made me. I'm not vain, I just appreciate the craftsmanship.
The one drawback to being perfectly crafted, is that everyone wants to stop and admire you.It wouldn't be such a big deal, but I can't even sign autographs.
Yeah, I'm pretty much the new mascot.I mean, can you blame folks for liking me so much? I'm gorgeous!
Ah, the admiring stares of my many fans I hope I'm this gorgeous the next time I'm reborn!
It's a good thing I'm not completely perfect. I'd probably be stuck-up.
I think I have a really good chance at winning the island's "Best Snowperson of " award.There isn't a lot of competition, and I've heard the judges value slight imperfections over flawlessness.
You know that wake-me-up feeling you get when you take a deep breath of fresh, icy-cool air? Yeah, I get that all the time.
I'm kind of an island superstar today. But I'm one good trans-oceanic wind current away from going global!
Well, I might not be perfect, but I can have a good attitude, you know? That's on me, bud.
If I were a snow sculptor, I'd probably roll me up a nice snow home and a cool snow car.
It shows character to accept one's lot in life. I've got a lot of character, bud. Yep. A LOT of character.
All snowfolks melt sooner or later. Might as well enjoy the rideand do it all again next winter!
If only my head had been made a little bit biggerBut you know what? I'm just gonna accept who I am and be happy.
I feel like I have a body-sized head and a head-sized body, you know?The key to making good snowpeople is to make body-sized bodies and head-sized heads.
I might not have great aesthetics, but I've got great balance with this big base. Sothere's that.
My balance isn't so great because my head is so big. I feel like I have to stand still so it doesn't roll off.
I really don't want to be on display, but snowfolks live outside, so
You know, I'm getting more and more comfy with the way I look. Perfection is overrated.
I get a real low-level view of the island. I tend to notice a lot about everyone's feet. Sorry. Didn't mean to make you feel self-conscious. You have good feet.
OK. Here's my last wishfor now. Next time you make me, try to make me look a little morecool.
My small head is going to melt faster than my body. What will my body think about when my head is gone?
This little body has a hard time supporting my big head. On the plus side, I'm very smart.
I have a bit too much snow packed around my body to see my feet
I think my body is going to collapse under the weight of my head

Aaaand nice to meet you! Finally, we can talk face-to-face!I was eager to meet you, even when I was still just a million little flakes. Nice work rolling me up, bud. As you can see, I'm Snowboy!I won't last forever, so let's have some fun on this island while we can.

Now listen, to thank you for making me, I want to share some knowledge about how to craft a special item.Check your NookPhone recipes for !Normally you can only get stuff like that when you make the most perfect version of meBut it's my birthday today, and we're meeting for the first time. Those events are worth some celebration!

I can't believe this is your first time making me. I mean, just look at me I'm perfect!It's a real head-scratcher Or it would be, if I could scratch my head.I sense incredible talent emanating from your crafting hands. We'll see great things from you in the future!

Your snowcrafting sensibilities are admirable. For your first snowfolk, I look pretty good.With just a little more practice, I'm sure you can build a perfect me!I hope you'll craft me again. I'll be monitoring your "snow"-gress.Maybe you'll make me with a better sense of humor next time
Well I've been made worse. And this is your first build, so I'll let a few mistakes slide. Try again sometime!

If I'm being honest, I'm not what you would call an amazing snowpersonBut everyone's gotta start somewhere, right? Keep trying, and I'm sure you'll get me right. Balance is the key. Keep that in mind for next time, OK?

Now listen, to thank you for making me, I want to share some knowledge about how to craft a special item.Wait Hang on You've never done DIY before, have you? Like, not even once?!Well, that's a problem Even if I taught you this recipe, you wouldn't know where to beginTell you what I'll just put the recipe on a message card. And then I'll send it to you later.I've heard there's an amazing DIY workshop available for you over at Resident Services. They'll teach you what's what. So go take that class right away. Then you can try making my special item!

Like, not even once?!Wow Even after I went and sent you my recipe for a special itemI've heard there's an amazing DIY workshop available for you over at Resident Services. They'll teach you what's what. So go take that class right away. Then you can try making my special item!
I'll give you a large snowflake! I want you to learn how to craft with DIY and make it right away!

They'll teach you what's what. So go take that class right away. Then you can learn how to DIY!

Like, not even once?!I've heard there's an amazing DIY workshop available for you over at Resident Services. Go take that class right away for me! Be the Y in DIY!
Here's a large snowflake to thank you for making me!This is a really rare item. You're gonna need it for my special DIY recipe!
I used my snow magic to put it in your pockets. Now go take that DIY workshop, and start crafting!
As the snow melts, snowfolks here on are taking in the sights for the last time.As you wander the island, take a moment to gaze upon and pay respects to my melting visage!
Well, my seasonal business is just about wrapped up.But you can bet I'll be back to visit next season!
So nice of you to take a moment to chat with your local snowperson near the end of his seasonThis island is great! I hope someone here builds me again next season!
Hello, traveler Enjoy your time on!
Welcome to !
Enjoy !
The best snowperson ever welcomes you, visitor, to the best island ever— !

Imagine a snowperson so marvelous that even a guest from another island can't help but stop to talk to himWell, imagine no longer, because it's happening right now, and that snowperson is me! Thanks for stopping!
Two things you need to see: my perfect self, andthe rest of !
I'm a pretty good snowperson from a pretty good island. Welcome to !
Feel free to take as many pictures of me as you want.I'm not super limber or pose-able, but you can still get some good selfies or glamour shots or whatever.
I'm a pretty great snowperson, but I feel I had the potential to be made even greater. It's buried deep within me! Feel free to spread the word around the island.
I might not be the most perfect snowperson ever created, but I like to think I make visitors happy.
It's so nice when you superstars take a moment to talk to us common snowfolk. It means a lot.
I could chat with you all day, but you must have better things to do than talk to a snowperson, right?
Today is my birthday. I was literally born TODAY. And your attention is the best present I've ever received.
You know how pizza is so good the next day after it's been in the fridge for the night? That's pretty much what's going on here. Day two is a good day for me. You may hug me if you wish.
Well, I don't have much time left on this little island, but it's been a blast.Tell your friends this: Don't let the snowfolk goodness end here. Make new snowfolks whenever you can!
I'm so excited to melt away today! I mean, I had a good run. And I can always come back next season.
